about_the_game:
Dr Muddles and the Cursed Library is a single player puzzle adventure game set in a mysterious library.

As the talented but confused sorcerer Dr Muddles, you awake in a strange library with no memory of who you are or how you got there. Explore the library, learn powerful spells, and try to find a way out. As you progress, you'll meet a few other inhabitants of the library, many of whom may not have Dr Muddles' best interest at heart. You will also learn a powerful spell allowing you to split your soul into multiple copies, which you'll use to solve puzzles and access new parts of the library. But beware, powerful magic like that may come with a terrible price!

Dr Muddles is best played with a gamepad, but works with keyboard and mouse controls as well.

You will also learn a powerful spell allowing you to split your soul into multiple copies, which you'll use to solve puzzles and access new parts of the library. But beware, powerful magic like that may come with a terrible price!

Dr Muddles is best played with a gamepad, but works with keyboard and mouse controls as well.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 or AMD Athlon II X2 6400+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 orAMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIAGeForce GTX 650, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7750, 1 GB

short_description: Play as the talented but confused sorcerer, Dr Muddles, who wakes up in a strange library full of dangerous magic. Explore the library and try to unravel the mystery of how you got here, and more importantly, how to get out!
